instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2879 Blank or large straight on display
threads.message:
Hi
the customer remove this display but when he reinstall it, the display is blank or large straight like the picture.
I try the screen on other macbook pro and it work well. the computer start on the system, i hear the volume dong when i change volume.
i check near connector, i reflow the connector, can you help me please?

threads.title: 820-2879 Blank or large straight on display
threads.message: It looks like a fucked LCD to me. But measure all LVDS lines at the LCD connector on diode mode.
